taxonomicnotes: Some references to Tetraodon guttifer in the literature may represent misidentifications of Tetraodon pustulatus.
rationale: This species is endemic to the Cross river. It is known from a single location within the Korup National Park and another location in the Lower Cross River (total two locations). Any unforeseen impact within the park or oil exploration within the Cross River will threaten the existence of this species.
